name: LSB Industries, Inc.
description: LSB Industries, Inc. is a leading manufacturer of chemical products for the agricultural and industrial markets. Founded in 1968 and headquartered in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, LSB specializes in producing ammonia, urea, nitric acid, and other nitrogen-based fertilizers. The company operates multiple production facilities across the United States, allowing it to serve a diverse customer base effectively. LSB is committed to sustainable practices and invests in technologies that minimize environmental impact while enhancing product efficiency. Its core mission is to provide high-quality products that help improve agricultural productivity and meet the growing global demand for food. Through innovation and operational excellence, LSB continues to strengthen its position in the chemical manufacturing sector. The company also focuses on expanding its market reach and product offerings to adapt to changing industry needs and customer preferences. LSB's dedication to safety, quality, and sustainability has earned it a reputation as a trusted partner in the agricultural and industrial sectors.

faq.question: What products does LSB Industries manufacture?
faq.answer: LSB Industries manufactures fertilizers such as ammonia, urea, and nitric acid, as well as various industrial chemicals.

faq.question: Where is LSB Industries headquartered?
faq.answer: LSB Industries is headquartered in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of LSB Industries?
faq.answer: Mark Behrman is the CEO of LSB Industries, Inc.
